abstract: Our exclusive video by Vava Ribeiro captures the whimsical dwellings of Cabo Polonio.
snippet: Our exclusive video by Vava Ribeiro captures the whimsical dwellings of Cabo Polonio.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Vava Ribeiro shot Cabo Polonio, a bohemian village in southeastern Uruguay, for "The Coast of Utopia." Here, his exclusive video captures more of the area's whimsical dwellings in breathtaking black and white.
